tags.name: authorization-method
tags.properties: An element to render an UI for various authorization methods

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Authorization method type.

Supported types are (case insensitive, spaces sensitive):

- Basic
- Client certificate
- Digest
- NTLM
- OAuth 1
- OAuth 2

Depending on selected type different properties are used.
For example Basic type only uses `username` and `password` properties,
while NTLM also uses `domain` property.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: When set the editor is in read only mode.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: When set the inputs are disabled.

properties.name: compatibility
properties.description: Enables compatibility with Anypoint components.

properties.name: outlined
properties.description: Enables Material Design outlined style.

properties.name: username
properties.description:
Current username.

Used in the following types:
- Basic
- NTLM
- Digest
- OAuth 2

properties.name: password
properties.description:
Current password.

Used in the following types:
- Basic
- NTLM
- Digest
- OAuth 2

properties.name: redirectUri
properties.description:
Authorization redirect URI.

Used in the following types:
- OAuth 1
- OAuth 2

properties.name: accessTokenUri
properties.description:
An endpoint to authorize the token (OAuth 1) or exchange code for token (OAuth 2).

Used in the following types:
- OAuth 1
- OAuth 2

properties.name: authorizationUri
properties.description:
An URI of authentication endpoint where the user should be redirected to auththorize the app. This endpoint initialized OAuth flow.

Used in the following types:
- OAuth 1
- OAuth 2

properties.name: authorizing
properties.description:
True when currently authorizing the user. Note, this property is read only.

Used in the following types:
- OAuth 1
- OAuth 2

properties.name: domain
properties.description:
Authorization domain.

Used in the following types:
- NTLM

properties.name: realm
properties.description:
Server issued realm for Digest authorization.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: nonce
properties.description:
Server issued nonce for Digest authorization.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: algorithm
properties.description:
The algorithm used to hash the response for Digest authorization.
It can be either `MD5` or `MD5-sess`.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: qop
properties.description:
The quality of protection value for the digest response.
It can be either (empty), `auth`, or `auth-int`.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: nc
properties.description:
Nonce count - increments with each request used with the same nonce.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: cnonce
properties.description:
Client nonce.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: opaque
properties.description:
A string of data specified by the server.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: httpMethod
properties.description:
Request HTTP method.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: requestUrl
properties.description:
Current request URL.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: requestBody
properties.description:
Current request body.

Used in the following types:
- Digest

properties.name: baseUri
properties.description: A base URI to use to construct correct URLs to authorization endpoints. The UI will present authorization endpoints as provided by the user or attributes. However, if the paths are relative (must start with '/') then base URI is added to the path.

properties.name: token
properties.description:
Oauth 1 or Bearer token (from the oauth console or received from auth server). 

Used in the following types:
- OAuth 1
- bearer

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when change ocurred. The event is dispatched synchronously but the change cannot be canceled. It does not contain the 'detail' object with parameters. Call the `serialize()` function or get the properties manually for current type.

cssProperties.name: --authorization-method-oauth2-redirect-info-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the redirect URI block in OAuth2 type panel.

cssProperties.name: --authorization-method-oauth2-redirect-info-background-color
cssProperties.description: Background color of the redirect URI block in OAuth2 type panel.
